company_overview.industry: B2B, HealthTech, Clinical Diagnostics, Data Interoperability
company_overview.mission_statement: Transforming diagnostics data infrastructure by extracting, digitizing, integrating, and ensuring the traceability of clinical diagnostics and health data for full interoperability.
key_milestones: Seed Funding of 2M (currency unspecified, assumed EUR or USD based on location and fundraising context)
Development and launch of a cloud platform for capturing, standardizing, and visualizing diagnostic data (MVP stage)
Focus on addressing the lack of standardization in diagnostic data formats
Building an AI pipeline to optimize workflows and enhance system integration
company_overview.current_status: Seed stage startup with a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) focused on scaling their platform, optimizing their AI pipeline, automating workflows, and enhancing integration with other systems. Actively seeking further investment to support global growth.
company_overview.unique_value_proposition: Connect by Circular-Lab offers a cloud-based platform that solves the critical problem of data silos and lack of interoperability in clinical diagnostics. By capturing, standardizing, and visualizing diagnostic data, they enable seamless integration and downstream utilization for various applications, improving efficiency and decision-making for healthcare providers and other stakeholders.
